CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Default to OW+
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: This option will set the default board to OneWheel+

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Low Battery Alerts
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: This option will vibrate multiple times depending on OneWheel battery levels: 75% (1 time), 50% (2 times), 25% (3 times), 5% (and 4)

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Metric Units
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: This option uses metric units (kilometers, celsius, etc). Currently requires a reconnect if changed.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Trip logging
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: This option enables continous (every second) dump of stats to CSV file on the sdcard (under /owlogs).
This option attempts to reconnect to device if it gets disconnected.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Day and Night Theme
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: This option uses night mode when it is determined that it is night or not. May require restart to take effect.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Night Theme
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: This option switches to the night theme. May require restart to take effect.
This option turns on the debugging and log window.
